quote: Claire, did I invite you to my barbeque?"" Massie asked, her neck tilting to the right and her arms tightly crossed.""Huh? No. I mean, I don't know,"" Claire said."" Massie said through her teeth.
quote_letters: CLAIRE DID I INVITE YOU TO MY BARBEQUE MASSIE ASKED HER NECK TILTING TO THE RIGHT AND HER ARMS TIGHTLY CROSSEDHUH NO I MEAN I DONT KNOW CLAIRE SAID MASSIE SAID THROUGH HER TEETH
